title: Barnwell: Two days after Halloween, four Super Bowl contenders proved to be not-so-scary
content: Have the Bills solved the Chiefs? Did Colts QB Daniel Jones regress? Do the Packers and Lions have underlying concerns, and could either make a trade?

title: Takeaways: Darnold dazzles, wild upsets and Daniels' injury
content: Our NFL Nation reporters answer the biggest questions from each game. Here's what we learned from Week 9.

title: Sources: QB Daniels dislocated elbow in loss
content: Jayden Daniels is expected to be sidelined indefinitely, but it is uncertain whether his season is over, sources said.

title: Darnold stars with 4 TDs in win, boosts MVP odds
content: En route to a 38-14 win over the Commanders on Sunday night, Seahawks quarterback Sam Darnold finished 21-of-24 with 330 yards, four touchdowns and one interception, boosting his odds for NFL MVP as his team improved to 6-2.

title: Little drills record 68-yard FG, sparking Jags in win
content: Jacksonville Jaguars kicker Cam Little hit an NFL-record 68-yard field goal as time expired in the first half against the Las Vegas Raiders at Allegiant Stadium.

title: Bears thrilled, Bengals 'sick' after wild shootout
content: After the Bengals scored two touchdowns in a 49-second span to erase Chicago's 14-point lead, the Bears pulled off their fifth win of the season when Caleb Williams delivered a 58-yard touchdown to rookie Colston Loveland with 17 seconds remaining.

title: Cubs earn major-league-high 3 Gold Glove awards
content: The Cubs had a major-league-high three Gold Glove winners this year, with Pete Crow-Armstrong, Ian Happ and Nico Hoerner taking home the honor.

title: Purdue enters hoops season as betting favorite
content: Expectations are high for Purdue going into the season, ranked No. 1 in the preseason AP poll for the first time, and bookmakers are giving them the added pressure of being preseason national championship favorites.

title: Morris claps back, says Patriots simulated snap
content: Falcons coach Raheem Morris said the Patriots defense simulated his team's snap on a key fourth-quarter play by clapping, leading to an intentional grounding penalty.

title: Why Marvin Harrison Jr.'s HOF dad struggles watching him play for the Cardinals
content: Marvin Harrison Sr. is trying to find the balance of being the father of a current player on a struggling team.

title: 'It feels like they gave up': Inside Myles Turner's painful exit from the Pacers -- to their fiercest rival
content: As he's tried to balance the memories of a decade in Indiana, Turner is embracing the other side of this heated rivalry. "[Indiana] made it very clear how they valued me," he said. "And so did the Milwaukee Bucks."

title: Way-too-early NBA All-Star predictions﻿: Which new faces will we see in L.A.?
content: Breaking down why Josh Giddey, Chet Holmgren and eight others could make the weekend in L.A. this season.

title: 17 men's college basketball teams that could win 30 games in 2025-26
content: History says a 30-win season could lead to a national title (see: Florida). Which teams could achieve the feat this season?

title: Tucker to Dodgers? A reunion in Philly and Boston? Best fits for top MLB free agents
content: Free agency starts at 5 p.m. ET on Nov. 6. Here are some pairings we'd love to see as this winter gets underway.

title: Inside the night the Dodgers became back-to-back World Series champs
content: After seven games and a history-making pitching turn, the first repeat champs of this century finally exhaled.

title: Hugh Freeze out at Auburn: Top candidates, transfers and recruits
content: After less than three seasons, they need a new coach on the Plains. Here's what could come next at Auburn.

title: The NHL's best this week: Caufield, Canadiens now a must-watch
content: The 24-year-old is setting franchise records for the Habs. Plus, a look at key games coming up around the NHL.

title: Week 9 winners and losers: Bowers and McCaffrey shine, Taylor and Gibbs fizzle
content: Brock Bowers, Christian McCaffrey and Caleb Williams led the way with big Week 9 performances, while Jonathan Taylor, Jahmyr Gibbs and Patrick Mahomes were among the biggest disappointments.

title: Tottenham have big problems; Haaland lifts Man City again; Griezmann scores 200; more
content: All is clearly not well with Tottenham after this weekend's lop-sided 1-0 defeat to Chelsea. PLUS: Spalletti's Juve debut ends in a win, Erling Haaland keeps scoring for Man City, and Antoine Griezmann hits 200.

title: AP Week 10 poll reaction: What's next for each Top 25 team
content: There wasn't much drama in the top 5, with Alabama and Texas A&M idle, but Georgia did squeak out a win.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Kane considering shock Barcelona move
content: Bayern Munich striker Harry Kane is considering a shock move to Barcelona next summer. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: 'I'm broken': Lone AI-171 crash survivor speaks out; now stranded in UK
content: Four-and-a-half months after a devastating Air India crash, sole survivor Vishwashkumar Ramesh faces ongoing physical injuries, financial hardship, and deep trauma. He has not yet received NHS psychiatric care and his family's business has collapsed. Ramesh finds Air India's interim compensation inadequate for his needs.

title: Nepal: 7 killed in avalanche on Yalung Ri mountain; 5 foreign climbers among dead
content: Tragedy struck Mount Yalung Ri in Nepal as an avalanche claimed the lives of seven individuals, including five foreign climbers and two local guides. Five others sustained injuries in the incident at the mountain's base camp. Rescue efforts are underway to reach the remote location, hampered by challenging terrain and weather.

title: 'Nitish in BJP's lap': Cong takes jab at Bihar CM; Kharge makes big claim
content: Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge attacked Bihar CM Nitish Kumar and the BJP, alleging the BJP will not reappoint Kumar as CM if NDA wins. Kharge accused Nitish of betraying socialist ideals by aligning with the BJP, which he claimed disregards Dalits, OBCs, and women. He also criticized PM Modi's governance and election campaigning.

title: SIR showdown in Tamil Nadu: CM Stalin cries EC 'conspiracy'; DMK moves SC
content: Tamil Nadu's ruling DMK has filed a Supreme Court petition challenging the Election Commission of India's Special Intensive Revision (SIR) of electoral rolls. This revision, set to begin November 4, covers 12 states, including Tamil Nadu, ahead of upcoming assembly polls. The ECI's SIR aims to ensure accurate voter lists through door-to-door verification.

title: Leadership change? 'Smriti Mandhana should take over from Harmanpreet Kaur'
content: Following India's historic ODI World Cup win, former captain Shantha Rangaswamy urged Harmanpreet Kaur to step down, believing it would benefit her batting and fielding. Rangaswamy suggested Smriti Mandhana as the ideal successor across formats, emphasizing the need for future planning. She also highlighted bowling as a concern despite the victory.

title: India's World Cup win: Twitter 'explodes' 456%; shares Virat Kohli tweet
content: India's women's cricket team has achieved a historic maiden World Cup victory, sparking a massive 456.5% surge in conversations on X (formerly Twitter) within 24 hours. The nation erupted in celebration after the team's dominant performance against South Africa. This monumental win, lauded by figures like Virat Kohli, Sundar Pichai, and Satya Nadella, marks a new era for women's cricket in India and inspires future generations.

title: 'Ashamed?' PM asks why Lalu missing from RJD posters; takes jab at Tejashwi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi attacked the RJD in poll-bound Bihar, questioning the absence of Lalu Prasad Yadav from party posters and his son Tejashwi's reluctance to mention his father's name. Modi alleged this indicates the RJD is trying to hide its "jungle raj" legacy from the youth.

title: 'Three monkeys ...': CM Yogi takes swipe at Rahul, Tejashwi, Akhilesh; Cong reacts
content: Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath likened Congress leader Rahul Gandhi, RJD's Tejashwi Yadav, and SP's Akhilesh Yadav to Mahatma Gandhi's "three monkeys" during a rally in Bihar. He accused them of being blind, deaf, and mute to the state's development and of colluding with mafias. Congress responded by stating Adityanath insulted Lord Hanuman with his remarks.

title: Amazon Rufus chatbot: CEO Andy Jassy makes a $10 billion prediction; here's how it works
content: Amazon CEO Andy Jassy projects Rufus, the AI shopping assistant, will drive over $10 billion in annual sales.  Launched in August, Rufus has already been used by 250 million shoppers, with a 60% higher purchase completion rate for users.  This chatbot aims to enhance product discovery and comparison within the Amazon app.

title: Iconic! Harmanpreet recreates Dhoni’s pose; clicked with trophy at Gateway of India
content: India Women celebrated their historic first ICC Women's World Cup win in Mumbai, with captain Harmanpreet Kaur posing with the trophy. Deepti Sharma's stellar all-round performance earned her Player of the Tournament. The team aims to make winning a habit, marking a new era for Indian women's cricket. Fans reminisced about Dhoni and Team India's World Cup win in 2011.

title: 'No time for Ram Temple': PM targets RJD, Cong; refers to Lalu's viral Halloween video
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi Modi criticized Congress and RJD leaders for allegedly dismissing Chhath as 'drama' while celebrating foreign festivals. He pointed to Lalu Prasad Yadav's Halloween celebration and claimed INDIA bloc leaders avoid visiting Ayodhya's temples, contrasting it with their global travels. This comes amid Bihar's upcoming assembly elections.

title: Jaipur tragedy: 12 dead as speeding trailer truck rams vehicles; locals block road
content: A devastating incident on Jaipur's Sikar Road saw an out-of-control dumper truck collide with numerous vehicles, resulting in at least 12 fatalities and multiple serious injuries. The truck, moving at high speed, lost control near Lohamandi, causing widespread panic and chaos. Emergency services responded swiftly to rescue and aid the injured.

title: Consumed by AI: Sam Altman admits OpenAI is consuming him; calls it ‘a little sad’
content: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman expressed envy for today's young entrepreneurs, particularly college dropouts, citing the vast opportunities and advanced AI tools that enable rapid product development.  He also reflected on the personal cost of leading OpenAI, admitting the company consumes his mental space, preventing him from pursuing new startup ideas.

title: 'SM18': Palash Muchhal's tattoo for Smriti Mandhana breaks the internet - See pic
content: Smriti Mandhana led India to their maiden ICC Women's World Cup title in 2025, with boyfriend Palash Muchhal celebrating her historic win. Muchhal showcased his support with a "SM18" tattoo, as Mandhana's stellar performance, including crucial innings and a significant opening stand in the final, secured India's victory. The couple is reportedly planning to marry in November.

title: Vanessa Bryant recalls Kobe’s heartbreaking moment focused on Gianna
content: Vanessa Bryant is releasing a photo book, 'Mamba & Mambacita Forever,' featuring cherished memories of Kobe and Gianna Bryant. She shared a touching moment from the 2009 NBA Finals, where Kobe cradled a young Gigi, his focus solely on his daughter's pride. The book aims to preserve these heartfelt moments for the world to remember.

title: Powerful message! Harmanpreet strikes out 'gentleman's' from cricket's old phrase
content: India's women's cricket team achieved a historic first-ever World Cup victory, defeating South Africa by 52 runs. Captain Harmanpreet Kaur's powerful message on her T-shirt, 'Cricket is EVERYONE'S game,' resonated as the team scripted a golden chapter in Indian sports history, inspiring future generations.

title: ‘Only 9 of 37 monitors worked on Diwali’: SC slams agencies over Delhi air gaps
content: The Supreme Court expressed concern over non-functional air quality monitoring stations in Delhi during Diwali, highlighting the need for proactive measures. The court directed the Commission for Air Quality Management (CAQM) to file an affidavit detailing steps to prevent pollution from reaching severe levels, emphasizing pre-emptive actions over reactive ones.

title: Shocking! Cricket league featuring Gayle, Praveen Kumar in chaos after organisers flee
content: The Indian Heaven Premier League (IHPL) in Jammu and Kashmir has collapsed, with organizers reportedly fleeing overnight, leaving behind unpaid bills and stranded players. International stars like Chris Gayle headlined the short-lived tournament, which aimed to boost local cricket and tourism but suffered from low turnout and sponsor withdrawal.

title: 'Pakistan conducting nuclear tests': Trump makes big claim
content: US President Donald Trump claimed Pakistan, Russia, China, and North Korea are conducting nuclear tests, justifying the US's decision to resume its own after over 30 years. He stated testing is necessary to ensure the reliability of American weapons systems, citing recent trials by Russia. Energy Secretary Chris Wright later clarified that discussions involved non-critical system tests, not full nuclear explosions.

title: UPI rush: Record Rs 27.3L cr transferred digitally in Oct; 20.7bn transactions done
content: UPI transactions reached an all-time high of Rs 27.28 lakh crore in October, with 20.7 billion transactions, driven by festive shopping. This surge highlights India's robust digital infrastructure and its growing dominance in global real-time payments, now powering 85% of domestic digital transactions.

title: China denies testing nukes: Beijing rejects Trump's claim; has advise for US
content: China has vehemently denied US President Donald Trump's claims of secret nuclear weapons tests, reaffirming its commitment to a moratorium and peaceful development.  Trump alleged that China and Russia were conducting underground tests, suggesting the US should resume its own. However, US Energy Secretary Chris Wright clarified any potential US tests would be non-critical system checks, not actual detonations.

title: 'Become a cook': Tej Pratap Yadav, BJP roast Rahul Gandhi's fishing act - watch
content: Tej Pratap Yadav criticized Rahul Gandhi's fishing act during his Bihar poll campaign, suggesting he should have been a cook instead of a politician. BJP MP Ravi Kishan echoed this sentiment, predicting Gandhi would receive fewer votes than the fish he caught. Gandhi participated in a traditional fish-catching ritual in Begusarai.

title: New York Rangers’ gesture for Seattle Kraken’s Brandon Montour shows true compassion
content: The New York Rangers showed remarkable compassion before their game against the Seattle Kraken. Comforting defenseman Brandon Montour after his brother passed from ALS. The heartfelt moment, led by Adam Fox. This highlighted the human side of hockey. By proving that respect and empathy can transcend team colors. Even in one of the NHL’s most competitive settings.

title: New pandemic alert? BRZ batCoV discovered in Brazil’s moustached bats
content: Scientists found a new coronavirus in Brazilian bats, named BRZ batCoV. This virus shares a genetic feature with SARS-CoV-2, the virus causing COVID-19. This discovery suggests important viral mutations can occur naturally. Researchers found no evidence of human infection. The finding highlights the need for wildlife surveillance in under-sampled regions.

title: UK mass stabbing: Man charged for attack on train; faces 11 attempted murder counts
content: A man from Peterborough faces multiple attempted murder charges following a shocking mass stabbing on a high-speed train in Cambridgeshire, leaving eleven injured. Two victims remain in critical condition after the incident, which prompted an increased police presence on the rail network. Authorities have confirmed the attack is not being treated as terrorism.

title: Taylor Swift–Brittany Mahomes bond stays strong despite political divide
content: Taylor Swift and Brittany Mahomes have forged a strong friendship amidst the NFL spotlight, navigating differing political views that have sparked public speculation. Despite these differences, their bond, strengthened by shared experiences and mutual respect, highlights a genuine connection that transcends online noise and political divides.

title: Your zodiac sign is 2,000 years out of date
content: Your zodiac sign may be inaccurate. Ancient astronomers based signs on constellations. Earth's wobble has shifted these star patterns over 2,000 years. Today, Western astrology uses seasonal signs, not star positions. Indian astrology aligns with star movements. Astronomy and astrology separated long ago. Belief in astrology persists due to its adaptability.

title: Louvre heist: Repeat offenders & 'criminal' couple — What we know about the suspects
content: French authorities have filed preliminary charges against four individuals in connection with the $102 million Louvre crown jewel heist. Three men are suspected of direct involvement in the break-in, with one arrested attempting to flee the country. A fifth suspect, believed to be the mastermind, remains at large as investigators continue their search.

title: 'Create apaman mantralaya': Priyanka mocks PM Modi over insult claims; slams Bihar NDA
content: Priyanka Gandhi Vadra criticised Prime Minister Narendra Modi, suggesting he should create an "apaman mantralaya" (Ministry of Insults) given his accusations against opposition leaders. Her remarks followed Modi's strong condemnation of Rahul Gandhi for allegedly insulting Chhath Puja, a festival celebrated in Bihar. Vadra also accused the PM of avoiding discussions on corruption and the NDA's performance in Bihar.

title: Kerala State Film Awards: Mammootty, Soubin Shahir, & 'Manjummel Boys', here's winners list
content: The 55th Kerala State Film Awards 2025 winners have been announced. Mammootty clinched the Best Actor award for 'Bramayugam'. Soubin Shahir received the Best Character Artist award for 'Manjummel Boys'. 'Manjummel Boys' was also declared the Best Film. Shamla Hamza won Best Actress. The awards celebrate artistic excellence in Malayalam cinema.

title: PM Modi's special meet-up with World Cup-winning Team India on the cards
content: India's World Cup-winning women's cricket team will meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi following their historic victory over South Africa at the DY Patil. The team, led by Harmanpreet Kaur, defeated Laura Wolvaardt and co. by 52 runs to secure the title for the first time in Women's World Cup history.

title: Who's tougher, Putin or Xi? Here's what Trump said
content: US President Donald Trump called Russia's Vladimir Putin and China's Xi Jinping smart and strong leaders. He stated they are not to be underestimated. Trump also spoke about global nuclear stockpiles. He mentioned discussing denuclearization with both President Putin and President Xi. The president highlighted the significant number of nuclear weapons held by these nations.

title: MP: 14-year-old girl offered lift in SUV, gang-raped by 3 in Betul
content: A 14-year-old girl was gang-raped in an SUV in Betul after accepting a lift from three men. They held her captive, took turns raping her, and then abandoned her at a railway station. Two accused have been arrested, while the third remains at large. The traumatized victim narrated her ordeal to police the following day.

title: Telangana man kills wife, sister-in-law, child over family dispute, ends life; elder daughter survives
content: A 40-year-old daily labourer in Hyderabad allegedly murdered his wife, sister-in-law, and 10-year-old daughter with a machete following a domestic dispute. His 15-year-old daughter survived the attack and alerted neighbours. The accused then took his own life.

title: India win WC: A whopping Rs 90 cr! India women’s cricketers set to become crorepatis
content: India's historic ICC Women's World Cup 2025 victory has ushered in a new era for women's cricket, with the team set to receive over Rs 90 crore in prize money and cash rewards. This unprecedented financial windfall, including a record USD 4.48 million from the ICC, marks a significant transformation for the sport in India.

title: ISRO plans 7 major space missions by March 2026 to boost India’s space growth
content: ISRO is gearing up for an ambitious seven-mission push by March 2026, including crucial uncrewed Gaganyaan flights to pave the way for human spaceflight. The agency will also deploy commercial satellites and advance technology with PSLV and GSLV missions, aligning with the Prime Minister's vision of 50 launches in five years.

title: Kyle Kulinski faces backlash over meme on Erika Kirk and JD Vance moment
content: Secular Talk host Kyle Kulinski faces widespread condemnation for a meme mocking Erika Kirk, widow of the late Charlie Kirk, labeling her a "fake grieving widow grifter." The post, featuring her with smeared mascara and cash, ignited fury online. Adding irony, an old photo of Kulinski with Charlie Kirk resurfaced, intensifying the controversy surrounding the insensitive meme.

title: Booster shot from GST cuts! Manufacturing activity jumps; October PMI rises to 59.2
content: India's manufacturing sector showed robust expansion in October, with the HSBC India Manufacturing PMI rising to 59.2, driven by strong domestic demand and increased technology investments. While export orders slowed, overall factory activity improved, supported by higher output and purchasing. Manufacturers anticipate continued production growth, fueled by optimism regarding demand resilience and GST benefits.

title: US-China rare earths dynamics: Scott Bessent slams Beijing's restrictions
content: US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent criticizes China's rare earth export controls, stating the US and allies are rapidly building independent supply chains. He accuses past US administrations of inaction, emphasizing the current government's "warp speed" efforts to counter Beijing's leverage. Bessent believes the global backlash may deter future Chinese restrictions.

title: Chilling video shows aftermath of tipper truck-bus collision; cries for help echo – Watch
content: A tragic road accident near Chevella claimed 20 lives when a Telangana RTC bus collided with a gravel truck. The impact was devastating, with the bus severely damaged and gravel spilling onto passengers. Locals bravely rescued many trapped individuals. Authorities are investigating the cause, with the Chief Minister ordering immediate relief and medical aid for the injured.

title: Punjabi songs, bhangra, dark glasses & hoodie: Harmanpreet a vibe after historic win
content: Harmanpreet Kaur led India to their maiden World Cup victory, defeating South Africa by 52 runs. The captain's gut feeling to give Shafali Verma an over proved a turning point, securing crucial wickets. Celebrations were jubilant, with the team dedicating the win to Jhulan Goswami.

title: 'She is like my daughter': BJP MLA Hansraj denies harassing Himachal woman
content: In a startling turn of events in Himachal Pradesh, a woman has publicly accused BJP MLA Hansraj of harassment and intimidation, claiming that a video made its way into circulation following her earlier FIR. She reveals that official pressures pushed her to seek justice through social media platforms.

title: Korean President receives Xiaomi phones as gifts from Xi Jinping; jokes 'is the line secure'?
content: During a meeting in Gyeongju, Chinese President Xi Jinping gifted South Korean President Lee Jae-myung two Xiaomi smartphones. Lee humorously inquired about communication security, to which Xi responded with a lighthearted remark about checking for backdoors, drawing laughter. The exchange occurred amidst ongoing global concerns over Chinese technology and espionage.

title: Coimbatore PG student raped by 3-member gang near airport; boyfriend assaulted
content: A postgraduate student was raped by a three-member gang near Coimbatore International Airport late Sunday night. The attackers assaulted her boyfriend, kidnapped her from a car, and abandoned her in an isolated area. Police have formed seven special teams to apprehend the culprits.

title: 'Things falling, people running': Powerful earthquake rattles Afghanistan - Watch
content: A powerful 6.3-magnitude earthquake struck northern Afghanistan near Mazar-e-Sharif, claiming at least 20 lives and injuring over 300. The quake, occurring at a depth of 28 kilometers, caused widespread destruction, damaging buildings and a holy shrine. Afghanistan's location on tectonic plate boundaries makes it highly prone to such seismic activity.

title: 14 Killed After Speeding Dumper Truck Rams Several Vehicles In Jaipur
content: At least thirteen people were killed and several injured on Monday when a speeding dumper truck rammed several vehicles in Jaipur.

title: Video: Bangladesh Nationals Confront Border Police In Assam's Sribhumi
content: A video has surfaced online showing a confrontation between Border Security Force (BSF) personnel and a group of Bangladeshi nationals near the Bhanga-Harinagar sector in Assam's Sribhumi district.

title: RJD Stalled Bihar Projects After Nitish Kumar Came To Power: PM Modi
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday charged the RJD with having stalled development projects in Bihar by putting pressure on the Congress-led UPA government at the Centre to "avenge" its ouster from power in the state in 2005.

title: Exclusive: "You Know SRK?" Sudan Rebels, Guns In Hand, Ask Kidnapped Indian
content: An Indian national has been kidnapped by the Rapid Support Forces (RSF) militia in Sudan, a country that has seen violent clashes erupt since 2023 between the Sudanese Armed Forces (SAF) and the RSF.

title: Man, Who Jumped Bail In 2021, Arrested For Forcing Girl Into Sharing Nudes
content: A man has been arrested for allegedly extorting money from a girl and her family after coercing her into sharing obscene pictures of herself, police said on Monday.

title: "High Time India Traded Dynasty For Meritocracy": Shashi Tharoor
content: The promise of democracy - government of the people, by the people, for the people - cannot be fully realised as long as Indian politics continue to remain a family enterprise, Congress MP Shashi Tharoor said.

title: Hindu Girl Rescued After Being Kidnapped, Forced To Marry Muslim Man In Pak
content: A Pakistani Hindu girl, who faced three harrowing months after being kidnapped, forcefully converted and married to a Muslim man, finally got to reunite with her family after a Sindh court's order, a community leader said here.

title: Brother Detained In UAE, Actor Celina Jaitly's "Ray Of Hope" Post After Court Hearing
content: The Delhi High Court today heard a petition by actor Celina Jaitly, who sought its intervention to secure assistance for her brother - Indian Army Major (retired) Vikrant Kumar Jaitly - who has been allegedly detained in the United Arab Emirates (UAE

title: Trump Threatens Military Operation In Nigeria Over 'Christian Killings'
content: US President Donald Trump has repeated his threat of a military operation in Nigeria over the killings of Christians, and that it could be ground or air attacks.

title: IIT Madras Launches AI Framework To Aid Discovery Of Next-Gen Drugs
content: The Indian Institute of Technology-Madras announced a breakthrough artificial intelligence framework that can rapidly generate drug-like molecules that are easier to synthesise in real-world laboratory settings.

title: UP Girl's Body Found With Slit Throat, Broken Limbs, Sand And Glue In Nose
content: A 15-year-old girl went missing from her home two days ago in Uttar Pradesh's Bahraich. Yesterday, her brother lodged a police complaint, accusing three men of kidnapping her.

title: Family Loses 3 Daughters In Telangana Bus Crash, A Man Loses Wife And Son
content: A tragedy on the Hyderabad-Bijapur Highway that took place on Monday morning has claimed 19 lives, shattering several families. Among them is Yellaiah Goud, a driver who has lost three daughters, all college students in Hyderabad.

title: "Every Day Is Painful": Lone Air India Crash Survivor After Miracle Escape
content: Videos from the scene had shown Ramesh walking away from the wreckage, dazed and covered in soot, as smoke billowed into the sky.

title: Bengaluru Domestic Worker Slams Pet Dog To Death In Apartment Lift
content: A domestic worker was arrested after she was caught on CCTV smashing a pet dog to death inside the lift of a Bengaluru apartment.

title: Air India's San Francisco-Delhi Flight Makes Precautionary Landing In Mongolia
content: An Air India San Francisco-Delhi flight made a precautionary landing at Ulaanbataatar in Mongolia after the flight crew suspected a technical issue en route, the airline said in a statement.

title: Opinion: Opinion | China's Great Military Bloodbath: Why Is Xi Firing His Own Loyalists?
content: On October 17, 2025, the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) expelled nine of its most senior military leaders, including members of the Central Military Commission, former defence ministers, and theatre commanders. What's behind these purges?

title: Meesho, Shiprocket Among 7 Firms To Get Sebi's Nod To Launch IPOs
content: As many as seven companies, including Softbank-backed e-commerce firm Meesho and Temasek-backed e-commerce enablement platform Shiprocket, have secured Sebi's approval to raise nearly Rs 7,700 crore collectively through IPOs

title: Delhi High Court Upholds Food Regulator's Ban On Misleading 'ORS' Labels
content: The Delhi High Court has dismissed a plea challenging the decision of the Food Safety and Standards Authority of India (FSSAI) to ban Oral Rehydration Salts (ORS) labelling on any fruit-based, non-carbonated or ready-to-drink beverages.

title: Zubeen Garg Murdered, Chargesheet By December 17, Says Himanta Sarma
content: Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma has said the state government is aiming to file a chargesheet in the Zubeen Garg death case by December 8.

title: For First Time In 8 Years, Pentagon Chief Visits Korean Border
content: Pentagon chief Pete Hegseth travelled to the border between North and South Korea on Monday, the first time in eight years that a US defence secretary has made such a visit.

title: Way-too-early 2026 Power Rankings: Are the Dodgers or Blue Jays No. 1?
content: los Angeles Dodgers beat the Toronto Blue Jays in an extra-innings, winner-take-all game 7 . it's the first repeat world series champions since the 2000 New York Yankees . a rotation featuring Yoshinobu Yamamoto , Blake Snell , Shohei Ohtani and Tyler Glasnow can get the team back on top . we kick off the offseason with our annual Way-too-Early Power Rankings focusing on how teams look right now,

title: Mid-air scare: Air India Delhi-bound plane reports technical issue; diverts to Mongolia
content: the TOI Business Desk is a vigilant and dedicated team of journalists committed to delivering the latest and most relevant business news from around the world to readers of the Times of India . the desk ensures that TOI readers are well-informed about the ever-changing and dynamic world of commerce .

title: Premier League 'Big Six' grades: Arsenal an A; Liverpool a D
content: the 2025-26 premier league season has reached a key stage . the so-called traditional "Big Six" have experienced wildly contrasting fortunes on their way to the 10-game mark . every top-flight team have now played 10 league games . four managers have already been fired .

title: Where Auburn ranks among the open Power 4 jobs
content: the 2025-26 coaching cycle wasn't expected to be calm, like its predecessor . but few forecast such a robust line of storms rolling through the sport in the first half of the season . all four power conferences have had a firing .

title: Fantasy Football Buzz: Dowdle takes control of Panthers backfield, Loveland saves Bears
content: fantasy football is viewed from a fantasy football perspective . the news cycle will constantly affect player values in fantasy football . our fantasy football Buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around the league .

title: The comprehensive guide to the women's hoops season, including preseason picks
content: the road to Phoenix and the women's final four starts Monday, when the 2025-26 season opens . some new names will be vying for national player of the year . the Huskies have moved on to the WNBA, and 'juJu Watkins' will sit out this season .

title: Greatest World Series ever? No question for Dodgers-Blue Jays
content: apologies to 1991, the Los Angeles Dodgers and Toronto Blue Jays just finished the greatest World Series . it was the greatest world series because of its compelling storylines, some of which were impossible to believe . the first pinch-hit grand slam in World Series history was the first game to begiard .

title: As Cowboys fight for playoffs, Micah Parsons trade looms large
content: the "Get Up" crew reacts to the cowboys owner saying he's been busy with his natural gas business . "you can't come off a game like [the loss to the Broncos] and not expect there to be changes," he says . the team's owner says he hasn't been working on a defense that has been, to be polite, porous .

title: A tale of four journeyman QBs and their 15 schools
content: despite the haters, we've reached a peak moment for journeyman quarterbacks across college football . nearly 40 quarterbacks from the 2020 class came back this year for one more season at the FBS level . they're 23- and 24-year-old grizzled veterans who feel even older inside their locker rooms .

title: Our NFL trade grades: Did the Eagles fix their CB situation with Alexander, Carter?
content: bart Scott explains why the Ravens should be trying to make a defensive acquisition . he says it will take years to know how well each team did . when a deal happens, we often hear the old adage that it's not hindsight .

title: Tracking every NFL trade deadline move: Jaelan Phillips to the Eagles
content: the 2025 NFL trade deadline is Tuesday at 4 p.m. ET . bart Scott joins "Get Up" to explain why the Ravens should be trying to make a defensive acquisition ahead of the trade deadline . we have you covered on every deal until the final second .

title: Sources: Eagles land Phillips in Dolphins trade
content: the Philadelphia Eagles will receive a 2026 draft pick in the deal, sources say . the 2021 first-round pick is scheduled to become a free agent after this season . Phillips has three sacks in nine games this season and 26 in his five-year career with Miami .

title: Resetting the CFP tiers after Week 10 and projecting the first bracket
content: two top-10 teams fell on the road to unranked opponents . a third fell to a lower-ranked team . two-thirds of the 2025 college football season done, we now shift into Playoff Hyperdrive .

title: Cardi B in Foxborough: Kraft's suite, Diggs' TD and a trademark celebration
content: cardi B spends time with her boyfriend to support her boyfriend Stefon Diggs . the couple previously announced they are expecting a child together . a videoboard at Gillette Stadium showed Cardi B cheering after a touchdown .

title: 🏈 CFB Power Ranking: Oregon moves into top 5
content: arch Manning waited until the last possible second before firing the ball to a leaping Emmett Mosley V in the end zone . the longhorns held on for a 34-31 win . he has 674 passing yards and six touchdowns in his past two starts .

title: How to watch ESPN amid Disney-YouTube TV blackout
content: a blackout of ESPN and other Disney-owned channels, such as ABC, has been reported . the conflict affects ABC, the ESPN netwo and the foxes . if you don't have cable access, you can get instant access to ESPN content through a variety of services .

title: CFP top 12: One last projection before the first committee ranking
content: defending national champion Ohio State should start the first college football playoff rankings on Tuesday . there could be some debate over the top spot when the 12 members of this year's group vote on teams for their first official top 25 ranking of the season . the bigger discussion will likely revolve around one-loss Alabama and undefeated Texas A&M for the no. 3 and no. 4 spots .

title: 'Hide your quarterback': Panthers target Jordan Love, Packers with petty post
content: the trolls were out once again in Week 9 of the NFL season . the Panthers clinched the win with a 49-yard field goal from Ryan Fitzgerald . a panther posted a graphic of the Lambeau Leap with the caption "Pack it up"

title: Jogi Ramesh’s arrest politically motivated, alleges Sajjala
content: YSRCP leader accuses  Andhra Pradesh government of vindictive politics, says case against former Minister is fabricated

title: YSRHU scientists assess impact of Montha’s damage to crops in A.P.
content: The researchers advised farmers to clean the fields, drain the stagnated water and follow steps given by the KVK scientists

title: Karnataka High Court awards compensation to minor boy whose mother ended life and father sentenced to imprisonment for wife’s death
content: The court has also directed DLSA to grant sufficient amount as compensation to the boy under the Victim Compensation scheme

title: Rajan exhorts all to be part of the journey towards Nava Keralam
content: Minister inaugurates the Vision 2031 Cultural Seminar organised by the Department of Culture in Thrissur

title: Mahasabha demands ST certificate for Talawar community
content: It has strongly criticised Rural Development and Panchayat Raj Minister Priyank Kharge for allegedly stalling the process of issuing ST certificates on flimsy grounds

title: Man arrested for chain snatching, gold, seven motorcycles recovered in Nellore
content: Accused allegedly got involved in thefts after getting habituated to casino, online betting and gambling

title: East Corporation to crack down on illegal constructions, orders weekly demolitions
content: Senior officials, including Commissioner, will begin inspections of all wards to monitor development activities

title: Forest Minister orders inquiry into death of wild elephants
content: ‘There is preliminary information that some basic protocols like following the standard procedure during wildlife sighting were not followed’

title: India's bioeconomy sector to reach $300 billion by 2030: NITI Aayog report
content: The report noted that with the right interventions, India can unlock new levels of agricultural resilience, inclusive rural prosperity, and global competitiveness in agri-tech innovation

title: One Health-based disease surveillance set to cover all districts of Kerala
content: After a successful pilot in Pathanamthitta, Alappuzha, Idukki, and Kottayam, the One Health programme aims at early detection of infectious diseases through active local-level monitoring of disease trends by trained community volunteers.

title: Focus on strengthening infrastructure in MSME parks, Minister tells officials
content: Kondapalli Srinivas directs officials to speed up works on roads, water, and power facilities in 175 MSME parks and ensure timely approvals for new industrial units

title: Here are the big stories from Karnataka today
content: Welcome to the Karnataka Today newsletter, your guide from The Hindu on the major news stories to follow today. Curated and written by Nalme Nachiyar.

title: GBA plans new drains to prevent flooding near Manyata Tech Park ahead of next year’s monsoon
content: Officials explained that the flooding problem around the tech park is not new and that it has continued for years because the original storm-water drain that once carried rainwater through the area no longer exists

title: 'Tipper collided, gravel fell on bus': 20 killed in T'gana; how tragic crash unfolded
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. The TOI News Desk is your trusted source for staying informed and connected to the ever-evolving global landscape, ensuring that our readers are equipped with the latest developments that matter most." Read More

title: Kalyan Bigha and Phulwaria, a tale of two villages and their changing fortunes
content: Incumbent Chief Minister Nitish Kumar’s ancestral village, Kalyan Bigha in Nalanda district, is a gleaming example of development in the impoverished State; RJD supremo and former CM Lalu Prasad hails from Phulwaria in Gopalganj district, which now shows signs of neglect, even as it hopes the party of its famous leader will return to power

title: Officials told to ensure quality and timely completion of road, drain works in Guntur
content: GMC Commissioner visits A.T. Agraharam Main Road, Nagaram Palem, Kundula Road, Brindavan Gardens, Krishna Nagar, Gujjanagundla, and S.V.N. Colony and reviews road and drainage works, as well as instances of road encroachments

title: Researchers discover new species of spider in a Chikkamagaluru village, name it after ‘Malenadu’
content: The study shows that the spiders are habitat specific, and if we fail to conserve the habitat, there are chances of losing the species

title: India, New Zealand begin fourth round of FTA talks, focus on goods, services and rules of origin
content: Rules of origin, which determine the source of any product, are a key obstacle in India’s FTA negotiations with the European Union as well

title: Bengaluru Metro to float tenders for Phase 3 civil works soon
content: Phase 3 of Namma Metro, also referred to as the Orange Line, will feature two major corridors spanning a total of 44.65 km with 31 elevated stations

title: Renukaswamy case: Actor Darshan, Pavithra Gowda and 15 others charged with murder, trial likely from November 10
content: The 17 accused have now been charged under Section 302 (murder), 359 (kidnapping), 120(b) (criminal conspiracy), 204 (attempt to destroy evidence) among other Sections of the Indian Penal Code (IPC).

title: Committee reiterates need to revive Mayiladuthurai-Tharangampadi rail link
content: Railway line has to be built only for 11 km between Tharangambadi and Thirunallar and it will greatly boost tourism development in the region, says  Mayiladuthurai-Tharangambadi Train Restoration Committee

title: Cleanliness drive: North Corporation to reward best performing area with ₹1 lakh
content: The work will include clearing waste, silt, debris, and tree branches, as well as cleaning storm-water drains and public spaces

title: Maharashtra doctor's death: Sena (UBT) leader holds protest, accuses police of leaking victim's call records
content: Shiv Sena (UBT) leader Sushma Andhare engaged in a public discussion with the an officer involved in the investigations and also accused police of leaking phone call records of the deceased doctor

title: Flight operations at Mumbai International Airport to remain closed for 6 hours on Nov. 20
content: The scheduled runway closure is designed to ensure continued safety, reliability and compliance with global aviation standards, Mumbai International Airport (MIAL) said

title: Cyclone alert issued for Andaman and Nicobar Islands: IMD
content: In view of the alert, the local administration has advised fishermen not to venture into the sea along and off the North Andaman Sea

title: Steps in place to streamline city traffic, says Kadapa MLA
content: Reddeppagari Madhavi Reddy lays the foundation stone for the installation of traffic signals in the city with NCAP funds amounting to ₹1.13 crore

title: BJP invites Thrissur Mayor M.K. Varghese to its fold
content: Mayor had said that he would not contest the upcoming elections or campaign for the Left Democratic Front. He also said he was open to working with those who shared his vision

title: UDF faces toughest test yet in Irinjalakuda as BJP too gains ground
content: After 25 years in power, UDF battles a speculated ‘loyalty shift’ of its traditional Christian base to the BJP camp. LDF banks on development projects initiated by Minister R. Bindu. Cooperative bank scams haunt both the UDF and the LDF.

title: Bihar Assembly polls: RJD-Congress hatching conspiracy in Seemanchal to upset demographic balance: PM Modi
content: Addressing a rally in Katihar, one of the districts in Bihar with a sizeable population of Muslims, Mr. Modi lambasted the Opposition for "surrendering before extremists"

title: 2020 Delhi riots: Being cherry-picked, no offence made out under UAPA, Shifa-ur-Rehman tells Supreme Court
content: Senior advocate Kapil Sibal, appearing for Umar Khaild, submitted that out of 116 cases tried and concluded in connection with the Delhi riots, 97 have ended in acquittals, and in nearly 17 cases, the court has pointed to the fabrication of evidence

title: 12 students of Morarji Desai residential school in Belagavi district of Karnataka hospitalised, food poisoning suspected
content: Some parents complained to reporters in Chikkodi on November 3 that the school teachers and staff were negligent

title: Sabarimala gold theft: SIT records arrest of Potti in second case, interrogates former TDB president
content: In connection with alleged theft of gold from the door frames of the Ayyappa temple. Court gives the Special Investigation Team seven days’ custody of the accused

title: Local body polls should be held only after electoral rolls are cleaned up: Uddhav Thackeray
content: Uddhav Thackeray also refuted the BJP’s allegation of “appeasement politics” with regards to voters list irregularities and said the Shiv Sena (UBT) and other Opposition party have not referred to any bogus voter by religion

title: BJP-JDU established only 'migration industry'; Bihar needs reconstruction: Congress leader Jairam Ramesh
content: Congress leader Jairam Ramesh reiterated his party's resolve to revive and strengthen Bihar's tradition of industry, asserting that the State needs reconstruction, not migration

title: A crystal-clear leftist who served the film academy well, Saji Cherian praises Premkumar
content: Minister dismisses controversy over academy reconstitution, says government only followed normal procedure

title: Supreme Court seeks CAQM affidavit on pre-emptive measures to tackle pollution
content: The counsel for the CAQM said that the Central Pollution Control Board is responsible for monitoring data

title: 2025 local body polls: opportunity to enrol on voters’ list on Tuesday and Wednesday
content: Public can also make use of the two-day window to apply for the exclusion of ineligible voters, making corrections and shifting names from one ward to another

title: NDA to set up defence corridor in Bihar, form commission to mitigate floods if voted to power: Shah
content: Amit Shah said the Mithilanchal region will be developed as a global knowledge centre at a cost of ₹500 crore, and the Sitamarhi-Ayodhya Ramjanaki Path will be built for ₹550 crore

title: Jharkhand BJP demands removal of Health Minister in blood transfusion case
content: Party workers staged demonstrations outside Sadar hospitals across the State over an incident in which five thalassemia-affected children were allegedly infected with HIV following blood transfusions

title: Karur stampede: CBI team visits TVK headquarters in Chennai, seeks details on CCTV footage
content: The party’s joint general secretary C.T.R. Nirmal Kumar told journalists that officers from the CBI visited the TVK headquarters in Panaiyur and sought details on the Karur stampede

title: Sovan Chatterjee returns to TMC after seven years
content: Political observers say the timing of Sovan Chatterjee’s return underscores the TMC’s strategy of healing old wounds and rebuilding its trusted core as it seeks to consolidate organisational strength before facing a resurgent opposition in 2026

title: Two taxi drivers arrested, two police officers suspended after tourist’s video on ill treatment at Munnar
content: Idukki District Police Chief says police will take strict action against those who attack or threaten tourists

title: Kerala State Film Awards 2024: ‘Manjummel Boys’ garners 9 awards; Mammootty and Shamla Hamza crowned Best Actors
content: Mammootty won his seventh Best Actor (Male) award, the most for any actor in Malayalam, for his performance as Kodumon Potty in Bramayugam, while homemaker-turned-actor Shamla Hamza won the Best Actor (Female) for her performance in Feminichi Fathima

title: ISRO lines up seven launch missions from SDSC SHAR Sriharikota by March-end
content: In line with the vision of Prime Minister Narendra Modi, ISRO team is working towards launching 50 missions over the next five years, says ISRO Chairman V. Narayanan

title: CM Stalin dares PM Modi over ‘divisive’ remarks against ‘Tamil Nadu’ during Bihar campaign
content: The Chief Minister also charged AIADMK leader Edappadi Palaniswami of being ‘double-faced’ about SIR and gripped by fear of BJP
